text: Bernard "Berny" L. Stone (November 24, 1927 – December 22, 2014) was an American politician. He served as an alderman of the 50th Ward of the City of Chicago, Illinois. Stone died on December 22, 2014 at age 87 from complications from a fall in Skokie, Illinois. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Committee of One: Berny Stone don’t need no stinking quorum" Mick Dumke, Chicago Reader, December 15, 2006 *"The $75,000 Parking Spot" Ben Joravsky, Chicago Reader, April 28, 2006 *The 50th ward's page on the City of Chicago Website *Bernard L.
